009
010package imagingbook.common.image.access;
011
012import imagingbook.common.image.PixelPack;
013
014/**
015 * <p>
016 * Instances of this class perform the transformation between 2D image coordinates 
017 * and indexes into the associated 1D pixel array and vice versa.
018 * As usual images are assumed to be stored in row-major order.
019 * Instances of this class do not hold any image data themselves, they just
020 * perform the indexing task.
021 * This is used, for example, by class {@link PixelPack}, which
022 * provides a universal image data container which 
023 * uses {@link GridIndexer2D} internally.
024 * </p>
025 * <p>
026 * The (abstract) method {@link #getIndex(int, int)} returns the 1D array index
027 * for a pair of 2D image coordinates. It is implemented by
028 * the inner subclasses {@link ZeroValueIndexer}, {@link MirrorImageIndexer} and
029 * {@link NearestBorderIndexer}. They exhibit different behaviors when accessing
030 * out-of-image coordinates (see {@link OutOfBoundsStrategy}).
031 * </p>
032 */
033public abstract class GridIndexer2D implements Cloneable {
034        
035        public static final OutOfBoundsStrategy DefaultOutOfBoundsStrategy = OutOfBoundsStrategy.NearestBorder;
036        
037        /**
038         * Creates and returns a new {@link GridIndexer2D} with the specified
039         * size and {@link OutOfBoundsStrategy}.
040         * 
041         * @param width grid size (horizontal)
042         * @param height grid size (vertical)
043         * @param obs out-of-bounds strategy
044         * @return a new {@link GridIndexer2D}
045         */
046        public static GridIndexer2D create(int width, int height, OutOfBoundsStrategy obs) {
047                if (obs == null) {
048                        obs = DefaultOutOfBoundsStrategy;
049                }
050                switch (obs) {
051                case ZeroValues         : return new ZeroValueIndexer(width, height);
052                case NearestBorder      : return new NearestBorderIndexer(width, height);
053                case MirrorImage        : return new MirrorImageIndexer(width, height);
054                case ThrowException     : return new ExceptionIndexer(width, height);
055                }
056                return null;
057        }
058        
059        final int width;
060        final int height;
061        final OutOfBoundsStrategy obs;
062
063        private GridIndexer2D(int width, int height, OutOfBoundsStrategy obs) {
064                this.width = width;
065                this.height = height;
066                this.obs = obs;
067        }
068        
069        /**
070         * Returns the 1D array index for a given pair of image coordinates.
071         * Subclasses implement (override) this method.
072         * @param u x-coordinate
073         * @param v y-coordinate
074         * @return 1D array index
075         */
076        public abstract int getIndex(int u, int v);
077        
078        private int getWithinBoundsIndex(int u, int v) {
079                return width * v + u;
080        }
081        
082        /**
083         * Returns the width of the associated image.
084         * @return the image width
085         */
086        public int getWidth() {
087                return this.width;
088        }
089        
090        /**
091         * Returns the height of the associated image.
092         * @return the image height
093         */
094        public int getHeight() {
095                return this.height;
096        }
097        
098        /**
099         * Returns the out-of-bounds strategy (see {qlink OutOfBoundsStrategy} 
100         * used by this indexer.
101         * @return the out-of-bounds strategy
102         */
103        public OutOfBoundsStrategy getOutOfBoundsStrategy() {
104                return this.obs;
105        }
106        
107        // ---------------------------------------------------------
108
109        /** 
110         * This indexer returns the closest border pixel for coordinates
111         * outside the image bounds. This is the most common method.
112         */
113        public static class NearestBorderIndexer extends GridIndexer2D {
114                
115                NearestBorderIndexer(int width, int height) {
116                        super(width, height, OutOfBoundsStrategy.NearestBorder);
117                }
118
119                @Override
120                public int getIndex(int u, int v) {
121                        if (u < 0) {
122                                u = 0;
123                        }
124                        else if (u >= width) {
125                                u = width - 1;
126                        }
127                        if (v < 0) {
128                                v = 0;
129                        }
130                        else if (v >= height) {
131                                v = height - 1;
132                        }
133                        return super.getWithinBoundsIndex(u, v);
134                }
135        }
136        
137        /** 
138         * This indexer returns mirrored image values for coordinates
139         * outside the image bounds. 
140         */
141        public static class MirrorImageIndexer extends GridIndexer2D {
142                
143                MirrorImageIndexer(int width, int height) {
144                        super(width, height, OutOfBoundsStrategy.MirrorImage);
145                }
146
147                @Override
148                public int getIndex(int u, int v) {
149                        // fast modulo operation for positive divisors only
150                        u = u % width;
151                        if (u < 0) {
152                                u = u + width; 
153                        }
154                        v = v % height;
155                        if (v < 0) {
156                                v = v + height; 
157                        }
158                        return super.getWithinBoundsIndex(u, v);
159                }
160        }
161        
162        /** 
163         * This indexer returns -1 for coordinates outside the image
164         * bounds, indicating that a (predefined) default value should be used.
165         */
166        public static class ZeroValueIndexer extends GridIndexer2D {
167                
168                ZeroValueIndexer(int width, int height) {
169                        super(width, height, OutOfBoundsStrategy.ZeroValues);
170                }
171
172                @Override
173                public int getIndex(int u, int v) {
174                        if (u < 0 || u >= width || v < 0 || v >= height) {
175                                return -1;
176                        }
177                        else {
178                                return super.getWithinBoundsIndex(u, v);
179                        }
180                }
181        }
182        
183        /**
184         * This indexer throws an exception if coordinates outside
185         * image bounds are accessed.
186         */
187        public static class ExceptionIndexer extends GridIndexer2D {
188                
189                ExceptionIndexer(int width, int height) {
190                        super(width, height, OutOfBoundsStrategy.ThrowException);
191                }
192
193                @Override
194                public int getIndex(int u, int v) throws OutOfImageException {
195                        if (u < 0 || u >= width || v < 0 || v >= height) {
196                                throw new OutOfImageException(
197                                                String.format("out-of-image position [%d,%d]", u, v));
198                        }
199                        else 
200                                return super.getWithinBoundsIndex(u, v);
201                }
202        }
203        
204        // -----------------------------------------------------------
205        
206        /**
207         * Exception to be thrown by {@link ExceptionIndexer}.
208         *
209         */
210        public static class OutOfImageException extends RuntimeException {
211                private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
212                
213                public OutOfImageException(String message) {
214                        super(message);
215                }
216        }
217
218}
219
220
